name: Zipline Adventure (ToasterHead, LucianoMartino, MJH Games)
description:
A game made in under 48 hours for GMTK game jam 2021
The theme is "Joined together", and here it's the main character is joined together with a zipline!

The Game:

An arcade-like shooter game where you can't get hit by the enemies, but rather by missing them!

Try and beat your high score! Shoot the fat guys (thugs) to get points and shoot the other enemies to avoid the zipline changing its route. Or maybe you rather keep some of them alive?

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys/WASD - to shoot
  • Escape - to go the menu
  • R - to restart
  • Enter - to start the game
